div.p: Conway School District would like to welcome you to our website! Feel free to explore the new web space by checking out some of our new features including: calendars, news, and family & student specific links. Subscribe to Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and Smore to receive updates on school and district information! If you don't find what you need contact us at info@conway.k12.wa.us

div.h2: School Closure Resources and Information Click on the links below

span.strong:
Technology during closure

Pharmacy and Grocery Workers Childcare
December edition of Conway Views District Newsletter

br.br:
Welcome to Conway School District!
As we navigate through this current health crisis, we want you to know that Conway School is here to support students, staff, families, and the community. If you are experiencing a hardship during this time, please contact our school counselor at ckombol@conway.k12.wa.us or myself at jcravy@conway.k12.wa.us
Jeff Cravy
Superintendent
We are nestled in the fertile farmlands and hills of the Skagit Valley between Mt. Vernon and Arlington. The Conway School has a rich history of providing high quality education for the students in the area, starting as early as the 1930s when a number of one-room schoolhouses were combined into the Conway School. Over the years the district’s commitment to excellence has taken many forms as staff strive to meet the needs of students to prepare them to move from our small K-8 district to one of the surrounding districts for high school.
We are excited to add a middle school course, the History of Skagit Valley, to our offerings. This course will study the surrounding geology, geography, and historically significant sites. We are excited about partnering with local farmers, businesses, and community agencies to bring a rich and varied experience to our students. We are pleased that this will allow students to visit the wonderful resources available right here in the valley.
We have a high rate of success preparing students for their future and invite you to visit our school to check out the great opportunities we provide for students.
Superintendent Jeff Cravy

span.style: font-size: 7.5pt; font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif; color: rgb(24, 53, 121);
span.span: Conway School District is a Gun/Weapons Free Zone. Please see our policy for information on weapons that are not permitted at school. a.title: Click on Link to see employment opportunities

div.p: Conway School District #317 does not discriminate in any programs or activities on the basis of sex, race, creed, religion, color, national origin, age, veteran or military status, sexual orientation, gender expression or identity, disability, or the use of a trained dog guide or service animal, and provides equal access to the Boy Scouts and other designated youth groups. The following employees have been designated to handle questions and complaints of alleged discrimination: Title IX and Section 504/ADA Coordinator Amanda Lewis: 360-445-5785 or alewis@conway.k12.wa.us; Civil Rights Compliance Coordinator Superintendent Jeff Cravy: 360-445-5785 or jcravy@conway.k12.wa.us. Conway School 19710 Hwy 534 Mount Vernon, WA. 98274
